result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

8:52 AM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett appeared by video for Scott W Read.  Attorney Ellen Anderson appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. State calls the case. Todays Hearing is the State's Motion to Join cases. Atty Willett argues the Motion, does not believe the motion is in the best interest of judicial justice, does not believe this meets the criteria for joinder of the cases.  State responds, asks the court to grant the motion to join.  Atty Willett would like to have Investigator Gronski testify. State asks the court to deny this request.  The court will not call Invest. Gronski today.  Court will find the State's Motion for Joinder is appropriate, court will grant joinder. Atty Willett will file Motions.  Atty Willett will make the motion to withdraw speedy trial demand. State would like to address the Motion to Amend Information.  Court grants the Motion to withdraw speedy trial demand. Court will grant the Motion to Amend Information.  9:22AM off the record for scheduling purposes. 

Jury Trial scheduled April 10, 2023 to April 14, 2023
Final Pre-Trial Conference March 23, 2023-1:30 to 3:30 in person
MIL/JI to be filed one week prior to PTC.
Briefing Schedule: Defense Motions to be filed by October 14, State will respond by October 31.
Court approved States request to schedule 22CF80, 22CF81 along with 22CF59 for MH 9/23/22
Motion hearing on September 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Letter from the State dated 8/28/22 concerning cases.
State's request to amend information

10:00 AM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett appeared by video for Scott W Read.  Attorney Ellen Anderson appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81, 22CF87, 22CM53.  Court calls the case, time set for a Motion Hearing.  Atty Willett addresses court as to the cases, has filed a Writ of Habeaus Corpus. State does not agree with recitation of Atty Willett's, states the court has not changed conditions of bond as to minor children, nor the reduction of bond.  Atty Willett argues bond, believes the amount of bond posted was the amount for all bonds. Court reviews the court minutes as to any bond changes.  Atty Willett requests that all bond money be returned to poster and will make a speedy trial demand. Court inquires if the deadline for speedy trial demand has passed, Atty Willett concurs that it has but circumstances have changed.  State suggests 22CF59 be set for trial first.  E.R. wishes to address the court. The court will have the victim(s) addressed by initials only. State asks for 3 days on the trail. 

Will set for Jury Trial November 2, 3, 4.  State requests a date for MH.  State will have until August 29th to file motion. Atty Willett will respond by 9/9. State will reply to response by 9/19.  Set for MH 9/23/22 @ 9:00 am, set for 2 hours. Set for PTC October 19, 2022 from 11:30 to 12:00. DE wishes to appear in person for this hearing.  JI/MIL/Vior Dire questions to be filed one week prior to Final PTC.
Transcript from Preliminary Hearing held May 10, 2022 before Honorable Steven P Anderson
Transcript from Bond Hearing held August 5, 2022 before Honorable Rod W Smeltzer.
Motion hearing on August 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt: 8:40 AM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett appeared by video for Scott W Read.  Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81, 22CF87, 22CM53. All cases set for Bond Hearings. 9:05am Court calls the case.  State calls appearances. Atty Willett addresses his bond motion, states all parties that were residing at the home of DE have all moved to other locations. ADA Nelson addresses the issue of supervised or unsupervised contact with minors.  This court addresses the issue of no contact with minors with  DE, absolutely no contact with minors of any kind will be allowed.  Adj 9:13am.
Bail/bond hearing on August 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:00 AM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett appeared by video for Scott W Read.  Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81, 22CF87, 22CM53.  22CF87-Oral Ruling. The court will deny the motion to dismiss the CC. 22CF87 will be set for PH. JA will contact parties after a new Judge is assigned and set these cases for PH/RH.  

Court finds good cause to go beyond the time limits for PH. 

Atty Willett would like to address the issue of bond. State objects any bond modification. Shelly Read addresses the court.  DE would be residing with his father is released. State would object to this arrangement, to their knowledge this residence was not an option. Cindy Read addresses the court. Atty Willett objects to Ms Read speaking. Parties are to contact Atty Willett concerning living arrangements.  Set for August 5, 2022 @ 9:00AM, Bond Hearings. ZOOM.
Status conference on July 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:33 PM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett appeared by video for Scott W Read.  Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81,22CF87,22CM53.  Atty Willett has filed a motion for bond modification, asking for the bonds in 22CF80, 22CF81 be amended to $15000.00 sign bond and that DE be allowed to have contact with minor grandchildren who reside in his home.

State objects. 

The court will deny the motion for bond modification at this time.  The court will take under advisement consideration of Atty Willett's request to lower case bond and give this decision on July 29th.
Bail/bond hearing on June 17, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:16 PM Defendant Scott W Read in court.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett in court for Scott W Read.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81-Arraignments. Waive reading of the Information, enter a plea of NG to all counts.

22CM53-RH 

22CF87-PH.  Atty Willett has filed a Motion in this case,  Atty will write a brief, will file by in 30 days, 2 weeks for the State to respond, will file by July 28th.  Set for Oral Ruling July 29, 2022 @ 9:00AM, ZOOM.  

Atty Willett would like to address the issue of bond, would like to amend bond to the original bond, and would like to have the condition that DE may be in the public accompanied by his wife and also address the issue of minor grandchildren that reside in his home.  State responds, asks the court to deny the DE's motion to modify bond. 

Atty Willett questions as to why DE is not housed in Rusk County Jail, does not agree with Sheriff Wallace's decision to house DE elsewhere. 

Court will set for Oral Ruling on the issue of bond June 17, 2022 @ 2:30PM, ZOOM.
Arraignment on June 15, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:36 PM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett in court for Scott W Read.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81 all Arraignment. Waive reading of the Information, enter a plea of NG.  22CF87-PH and 22CM53-RH. 

22CF87-PH.This will be rescheduled to June 15, 2022 @ 2:30. In person hearing. Adj 3:49PM

3:36 PM Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Stephen Donald Willett in court for Scott W Read.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81 all Arraignment. Waive reading of the Information, enter a plea of NG.  22CF87-PH and 22CM53-RH. 

22CF87-PH.This will be rescheduled to June 15, 2022 @ 2:30. In person hearing. Adj 3:49PM
Arraignment on June 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

10:33 AM Defendant Scott W Read in court.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Stephen Willett appears with DE.  DE in custody.  Heard along with 22CF59-PH, 22CF80-PH, 22CF81-PH, 22CF87-INIT APP, 22CM53-RH.

22CF87-Waive formal reading of the CC. 

22CF59-PH. State calls Investigator Steve Gronski. Oath given. Direct by the State. Witness has identified the Defendant. Objection. 10:52am Cross by Atty Willett. Witness dismissed. The State would like the court to admonish DE to speak only to his Attorney, not to ADA Nelson.  Court finds PC exists, will bind over.  

22CF80-State calls Investigator Steve Gronski. Witness remains under oath.  Direct by the State.  11:04am Cross by Atty Willett. Objection. 11:11AM Witness dismissed.  Court finds PC, will bind over for Trial. 

22CF81-State calls Investigator Steve Gronski, witness remains under oath.  Direct by the State. 11:15 am Cross by Atty Willett. 11:24am Witness dismissed.  Court finds PC, will bind over for trial.  Set for Arraignment/RH/ PH June 7, 2022 @ 3:30PM. Adj 11:27am.

1:02 PM Prosecuting attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Scott W Read appeared by video.  Attorney Terry L. Nussberger appeared by video for Scott W Read. Heard along with 22CF59, 22CF80, 22CF81, 22CM53.  22CM53-Waive formal reading of the CC, enter a plea of NG.  22CF59-22CF80-22CF81-, Waive reading of the CC.
